MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  LL32 postcode area of Conwy, affecting properties in Meirion Drive, Stephenson Close and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:58PM.Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 9PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:53PM on 2nd November 2020
